title: Seneca's morals abstracted in three parts : I. of benefits, II. of a happy life, anger, and clemency, III. a miscellany of epistles / by Roger L'Estrange.
author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Brome ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Senecas morals by way of abstract, of benefits ... London ... 1678" has special t.p.
"Senecas morals of a happy life, of anger and clemency ... London ... 1678" has special t.p. and separate paging.
"Seneca's morals, the third and last part, digested into XXVIII epistles ... London ... 1678" has special t.p. and separate paging.
